sentences.english: His heart malicious and that the truth is inverted.
sentences.chinese: 他心肠歹毒，说的倒也是实话。

sentences.english: But real women can endure the worst in one another.
sentences.chinese: 可真正的女人却能忍耐彼此的邪恶歹毒。

sentences.english: Turn us into a vicious life in this way, rogue with higher education.
sentences.chinese: 歹毒的生活把我们变成了这样，受过高等教育的流氓。

sentences.english: And never forget that momentum is a cruel mistress.
sentences.chinese: 不要忘记冲动是歹毒的情人。

sentences.english: He turned his baleful glare on the cowering suspect.
sentences.chinese: 他歹毒地盯着那个蜷缩成一团的嫌疑犯。

sentences.english: Malicious fates are bent on working out an ill intent.
sentences.chinese: 恶意的命运诸神决心实现歹毒的用意。

sentences.english: A person with a poisonous mind becomes a snake or a scorpion, or some other poisonous insect.
sentences.chinese: 一个歹毒的人会变成蛇蝎，或者其他毒虫。

definition: deceitful in many ways (idiom); wily and mischievous/full of craft and cunning
to lend sb a knife to kill sb/to get sb else to do one's dirty work/to attack using the strength of another (idiom)
to kill secretly/to stab in the back
